segments.text: So Dick , how about getting some coffee for tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Coffee ? I don ’ t honestly like that kind of stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , you can at least try a little , besides your cigarette .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s wrong with that ? Cigarette is the thing I go crazy for .
segments.speaker: S2
